title: Bi-Weekly Movies, TV Shows, Documentaries & Podcasts Discussion Thread
selftext:
So, what is r/India watching of late?

Watched any premieres yesterday? Loved any movie that you saw recently and are dying to discuss it? Discovered any new series lately? Well, this is your space. Go crazy!

This is not just limited to Hollywood/Bollywood, nor to any particular language.

Feel free to share short films, or podcasts of your choice, too, and ask for recommendations for what to watch!

**Movies and Shows Thread is posted every two weeks on Saturday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Movies+thread+discussion+&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/e3cqi5nuw8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=c6623226acf7856bb5a61313af7bec382c8525f1
comments: I am happy that Curb your Enthusiasm's new season has started.
Any crime thriller movie recommendations?
Watch Searching on Netflix and then come back here to thank me....

If you can watch Korean movies- 

Memories of Murder, Mother, Burning are some good crime thrillers. Confession of murder is alright, I did not like it too much.
I have watched it already. Thanks for the recommendation though. It's a good thriller.

Watched [Thinkalazhcha Nishchayam](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt12091980/) a malayalam movie on SonyLiv.
Very good would recommend. Writing was superb.
Operation Java

Ishq (Malayalam 2019). Don't go by the name. It's a pretty different kind of a  crime thriller. No spoiler, except that it gets gripping after 20 mins into the movie.

It's on Prime Videos.
'The Medium'.. Amazing Thai horror movie.. Soon somebody in Hollywood or bollywood might remake this

The Man From Nowhere

Oldboy

Watched 

**The Man From Nowhere** - Cool. I can see John Wick was inspired by this. 9/10

**Daredevil Season 2** - Brilliant, Charlie Cox/Daredevil and Jon Bernthal/Punisher absolutely killed it(hah). Vincent/Kingpin is perfect as usual . 10/10

**Luke Cage Season 1** - Mike Colter is ok. Pops actor was funny. Mahershala Ali is brilliant as cottonmouth. Diamondback is a crap character but the actor is really good. Hope he gets a good role in the future. Disappointing show overall in terms of plot. 6/10

**Iron Fist Season 1** - Absolute dogshit. Only the actress who played Colleen is worth anything. Butchered Iron Fist. The Meachums storyline was fun though. Harold Meachum was scary. Overall dogshit. 3/10

**Defenders** - I am conflicted . The heroes are pretty good. Even Iron Fist. Fights are awesome. Plot is dogshit though. The Hand is lame and ending was lame. End Credits give me hope though

**Punisher Season 1** - Absolutely brilliant. It was perfect. John Bernthal is an amazing Punisher and actor overall. 10/10 . Look forward to Punisher Season 2 and Daredevil Season 3. Although I will watch Luke Cage Season 2  and Iron Fist Season 2 and probably Jessica Jones first.

I hated Daredevil season 2 especially the Elektra and the ninjas plot.

Daredevil season 3 was amazing though.
As I said. The Hand was crap . In Daredevil , Iron Fist and in Defenders. But I rated Daredevil Season 2 for the other things.
Jessica Jones season 1 is awesome
Clue (1997, Japanese)
I have seen it. I meant s2 and s3
Listening to Stephen fry 7 deadly sins. This man is so amazing in story telling and knowledge.
Watching the Sleepy Hollow tv series. It is quite good so far.

If you have the stomach for it, watch Oldboy, the original Korean version. It's an epic masterpiece of despair and action. And when you finish it, listen the song Yeh Hai Meri Kahaani by Strings. The song is outstanding and was used in the okay-ish Hindi remake of the film.

Litte late but watched Uddham Singh yesterday. It was great. The Jallianwala Bhag massacre scene was heartbreaking. Amol Parashar as Bhagat Singh was a fresh take. Bollywood has always showed the nationalism of the great revolutionary Bhagat Singh. But this time it showed the socialism, humanism and Marxism along with his nationalism. Please do watch if you haven't already.
Punisher and Daredevil has been cancelled by Netflix.

I know. I meant Punisher Season 2 and Daredevil Season 3.

Also Daredevil might get Season 4 in Disney + with Echo as protag
good indian lovestory movie ?, south north language no problem .
Anupama, just Anupama

Kappela(Malayalam). It's on Netflix.

Bangalore Days (also Malayalam)
thanks : )
2 hours 40 mins looks a bit of a stretch.
Ikr, it's actually good. Feels kinda different from other daily soaps (except the occasional crying). The characters are really fleshed out somewhat.
sardar udham is quite good if someone here hasn't watched it already
Hey, thank me only if you like them. Then may be i will recommend you more.
Yeah. They could have condensed it a bit. But overall its worth the watch.
Your namesake book is also quite good, if you haven't read it already
I have. also, SU is a new movie that's why I recommended it
I've watched them both earlier. Would love for you to recommend morr

I was quite disappointed by Sardar Udham. I don't know what's with this new trend of making movies in a non-linear timeline, but this should only be done when it serves some purpose to the story. I thought it would be a good movie to watch together with family. But the way they jumped from one scene to another, the generation in my family who are more used to linear storytelling were not able to keep track of what's happening. 

It was such a good story with huge potential, but it lost an entire generation of viewers just because the director wanted to present it in a different format.

I watched Sarpatta Parambarai on suggestion from a friend. Watched with subtitles. I highly recommend it if u haven't watched already. A slow burner. But, just Wow. Hands down Movie of the year. I probably would have enjoyed it more had I known the language.
I highly recommend Sarpatta Parambarai
Ustaad Hotel may be. Not as good as these ones, but still decent.
